source.name: Unearthed Arcana: Subclasses - Part 3
source.author: Wizards of the Coast
source.description: Continuing our series of new D&D subclasses in 2020, Unearthed Arcana presents three more for you to playtest: the Armorer for the artificer, the Circle of the Stars for the druid, and the Fey Wanderer for the ranger. Today's article also includes some new infusions for the artificer.
